column4: hi, the other day i switched the mode of my modem from bridged to routing... i had lots of trouble with my internet connection so i tried that... it seems that browsing is much better now, but at times gaim or xchat lose their connection, and azureus is fairly slow... i lost connection just now... whenever such a disconnect occurs, also torrent transfers drop to zero (in and out)... not sure yet how streams behave...
does anyone have experience with port forwarding?
maybe I can help.. what's up
just read your previous post.  Is your "modem" a adsl modem?
as i said...i've had lots of trouble with my internet connection lately and tried to switch from bridged to routing mode on my modem
yes
and it has several ports for additional computers on the back?
no
IdleOne, a gnet modem
k looking it up..
IdleOne, bb0060 to be precise
sorry... i did lose connection just now...
last post i saw from you was "k looking it up.."
yep.. looked at the setup screens for the modem.. did't see a location to configure port forwarding.
trying to find a more definitive link for setup description
ok... ty
which model do you have?
bb0060b even

here's a pretty complete link on how to setup the modem for portforwarding based on programs. By finding the specific program or looking at other configurations you'll get the idea on how to configure.  http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Gnet/BB0060B/BB0060Bindex.htm
ok thanks
np..
